exceptions.exn: In environment P : ProgrammingLanguage MD : Model BSS : BigStepSemantics P model J : Join model R : Relation model L : Language sepconL : SepconLanguage L SM : Semantics L MD fsepconSM : SepconSemantics L MD tt SM c : cmd P0, Q, F : expr H : forall (s_pre : model) (ms_post : MetaState model), s_pre |= P0 -> access s_pre c ms_post -> match ms_post with | Error => False | NonTerminating => True | Terminating s_post => s_post |= Q end s_pre, m : model Hpre : s_pre |= P0 * F Haccess : access s_pre c (Terminating m) denote_closed : forall x : expr, upwards_closed_Kdenote (Kdenotation tt x) falsep : expr frame_property : forall (m mf m' : model) (c : cmd) (n' : MetaState model), join m mf m' -> access m' c n' -> exists (n : MetaState model) (nf : model), mf <= nf /\\ lift_join n (Terminating nf) n' /\\ access m c n PreOrder_Reflexive : Reflexive Krelation PreOrder_Transitive : Transitive Krelation X0, X1, X2 : expr Unable to unify "access s_pre c (Terminating m)" with "m |= Q * F".

original: intros c P0 Q F H. unfold triple_partial_valid in *. intros s_pre ms_post Hpre Haccess. apply H. - destruct fsepconSM. specialize (sat_emp s_pre). rewrite -> sat_andp in Hpre. destruct Hpre as [HP0 HF]. pose proof (WeakSemantics.WeakSemantics.sepcon_closed _ _ HP0 HF). auto. - apply Haccess.
